scenes.description: Hololive Indonesia members perform their original song 'Show Them (Who You Are)'.
Transition scene with crowd cheering as the stage resets for the next performance.
Hololive English and Hololive Indonesia members perform the original song 'All for One'.

subtitles.original: Show Them (Who You Are)
subtitles.english: Show Them (Who You Are)

subtitles.original: Dan tak takut
subtitles.english: And not afraid

subtitles.original: Karena takkan ada akhirnya
subtitles.english: Because it will never end

subtitles.original: Semua kan baik saja
subtitles.english: Everything will be just fine

subtitles.original: Harapan baru denganmu
subtitles.english: A new hope with you

subtitles.original: Tajam lurus ke depan
subtitles.english: Sharp and straight ahead

subtitles.original: Tuk mulai bermimpi...
subtitles.english: To start dreaming...

subtitles.original: ...genggamlah yang kau cari
subtitles.english: ...hold onto what you seek

subtitles.original: Dan kita kan la-la-la, la-la-la
subtitles.english: And we will la-la-la, la-la-la

subtitles.original: Kau takkan sendiri
subtitles.english: You won't be alone

subtitles.original: Show them and travel far
subtitles.english: Show them and travel far

subtitles.original: Run and show them who you are
subtitles.english: Run and show them who you are

subtitles.original: I'll be singing la-la-la, la-la-la
subtitles.english: I'll be singing la-la-la, la-la-la

subtitles.original: Kau takkan pernah sendiri
subtitles.english: You will never be alone

subtitles.original: It's time to show them who you are
subtitles.english: It's time to show them who you are

subtitles.original: Just shout it from the mountain high
subtitles.english: Just shout it from the mountain high

subtitles.original: To the sky we go, we go, oh
subtitles.english: To the sky we go, we go, oh

subtitles.original: All for One
subtitles.english: All for One

subtitles.original: Just look around and see
subtitles.english: Just look around and see

subtitles.original: It's so incredible
subtitles.english: It's so incredible

subtitles.original: So many smiles in this sea of light
subtitles.english: So many smiles in this sea of light

subtitles.original: Take one step with me and you'll be dazzled
subtitles.english: Take one step with me and you'll be dazzled

subtitles.original: There's magic in the air tonight
subtitles.english: There's magic in the air tonight

subtitles.original: The hours zoom zoom zoom, my heart goes boom boom boom
subtitles.english: The hours zoom zoom zoom, my heart goes boom boom boom

subtitles.original: The world is brighter because you believe in me
subtitles.english: The world is brighter because you believe in me

subtitles.original: Let's shout it loud loud loud, our time is right now
subtitles.english: Let's shout it loud loud loud, our time is right now

subtitles.original: We're on the edge of destiny
subtitles.english: We're on the edge of destiny

subtitles.original: For a moment I can dream with you
subtitles.english: For a moment I can dream with you

subtitles.original: Every miracle we hope for might come true
subtitles.english: Every miracle we hope for might come true

subtitles.original: We come together reaching out from far away
subtitles.english: We come together reaching out from far away

subtitles.original: And suddenly you're here by my side
subtitles.english: And suddenly you're here by my side

subtitles.original: When our voices and hearts unite
subtitles.english: When our voices and hearts unite

subtitles.original: We're gonna shine bright together, we're all for one
subtitles.english: We're gonna shine bright together, we're all for one

subtitles.original: Let's sing all for one
subtitles.english: Let's sing all for one

subtitles.original: The thrill of happiness is all around us
subtitles.english: The thrill of happiness is all around us

subtitles.original: Jump in 'cause it's all for one, let's sing all for one
subtitles.english: Jump in 'cause it's all for one, let's sing all for one

subtitles.original: We're on our way to good times, good vibes
subtitles.english: We're on our way to good times, good vibes

subtitles.original: We'll treasure this day the rest of our lives (hey!)
subtitles.english: We'll treasure this day the rest of our lives (hey!)

subtitles.original: All that we waited for, the dream we're striving toward
subtitles.english: All that we waited for, the dream we're striving toward

subtitles.original: We're singing all for one, all for one
subtitles.english: We're singing all for one, all for one

subtitles.original: Some things in motion, get up it starts a celebration
subtitles.english: Some things in motion, get up it starts a celebration

subtitles.original: Come see the wonders here beyond imagination
subtitles.english: Come see the wonders here beyond imagination

subtitles.original: We're joining hands for the world to see
subtitles.english: We're joining hands for the world to see

subtitles.original: Feel the love and the energy
subtitles.english: Feel the love and the energy

subtitles.original: The hours zoom zoom zoom, my heart goes boom boom boom
subtitles.english: The hours zoom zoom zoom, my heart goes boom boom boom

subtitles.original: A dizzy whirlwind of dreams and reality
subtitles.english: A dizzy whirlwind of dreams and reality

subtitles.original: Let's shout it loud loud loud, our time is right now
subtitles.english: Let's shout it loud loud loud, our time is right now

subtitles.original: We're here together finally
subtitles.english: We're here together finally

subtitles.original: Every moment takes my breath away
subtitles.english: Every moment takes my breath away

subtitles.original: There's a feeling here that words cannot convey
subtitles.english: There's a feeling here that words cannot convey

subtitles.original: We hear the rhythm and we rise to meet the song
subtitles.english: We hear the rhythm and we rise to meet the song

subtitles.original: And suddenly our hearts beat as one
subtitles.english: And suddenly our hearts beat as one

subtitles.original: Every voice ringing loud and clear
subtitles.english: Every voice ringing loud and clear

subtitles.original: So glad to be here together, we're all for one
subtitles.english: So glad to be here together, we're all for one

subtitles.original: Let's sing all for one
subtitles.english: Let's sing all for one

subtitles.original: We'll sing in harmony and we'll be happy
subtitles.english: We'll sing in harmony and we'll be happy

subtitles.original: Jump in 'cause it's all for one, let's sing all for one
subtitles.english: Jump in 'cause it's all for one, let's sing all for one

subtitles.original: Keep up the hype, it's good times, good vibes
subtitles.english: Keep up the hype, it's good times, good vibes

subtitles.original: Remember this night the rest of our lives (hey!)
subtitles.english: Remember this night the rest of our lives (hey!)

subtitles.original: Raise up your hands and sway, your light will lead our way
subtitles.english: Raise up your hands and sway, your light will lead our way

subtitles.original: We're shining all for one, all for one
subtitles.english: We're shining all for one, all for one

subtitles.original: Stomp in your memories, your joy and your hope
subtitles.english: Stomp in your memories, your joy and your hope

subtitles.original: We'll gather and we'll sing upon this endless road
subtitles.english: We'll gather and we'll sing upon this endless road

subtitles.original: Feel the music in your passion is on
subtitles.english: Feel the music in your passion is on

subtitles.original: We're right here right now, so let the good times roll
subtitles.english: We're right here right now, so let the good times roll

subtitles.original: Every time that I'm with you
subtitles.english: Every time that I'm with you

subtitles.original: I could swear it's like a wish is coming true
subtitles.english: I could swear it's like a wish is coming true

subtitles.original: So I believe in you if you believe in me
subtitles.english: So I believe in you if you believe in me

subtitles.original: Together we can chase all our dreams
subtitles.english: Together we can chase all our dreams

subtitles.original: When our voices and hearts unite
subtitles.english: When our voices and hearts unite
